_header: O strong Judith so full of might
Note: For a variant of stanzas 2, 3, 8, see 3940, stanzas 4-6.
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: James Ryman, ‘Mater misericordie’ — eight quatrains (abab) including refrain, ‘Mater misericordie,’ and burden (bb): ‘Salue regina glorie / Mater misericordie’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O stronge Iudith so full of myghtBy thy vertu we be made
                    fre…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…In the sweete blysse of paradyseMater
                    misericordie
